desc: Clean, nontoxic hand or body soap option. Organic ingredients with no SLS, no parabens, no triclosan, no ammonium lauryl sulfate. No perfume/parfum, just high grade essential oils. Foaming soap that is gentle and nourishing, does not dry skin. Sustainable and reusable packaging. Concentrates make for affordable refill

layout.text: Handwashing has to happen. Dried, cracked skin doesn't.
